TopicTitle: Anti-aliasing in OpenGL mode via Nvidia Inspector

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Is it at all possible to force anti-aliasing via Nvidia Inspector while in OpenGL with a similar performance hit to running normal anti-aliasing outside of OpenGL mode?

If this is the wrong sub-forum, my apologies.

Thanks.

I believe you should ask this on an Nvidia forum, though it looks like there is [**very little to no documentation**](https://forums.geforce.com/default/topic/516401/geforce-drivers/nvidia-inspector-guide/).

The [**Nvidia settings**](https://developer.nvidia.com/sites/default/files/akamai/tools/docs/PG-5116-001_v02_public.pdf) should have global and per-program anti-aliasing overrides though.
